Core Methodology

Frequently Asked Questions

1

Can I maintain a chain-of-custody during degaussing?

+
Yes. For HMG customers requiring hands-on HMIS custody, we operate an on-campus witness room adjacent to the degauss station. Every media device is uniquely ID‚Äôd and logged into our chain-of-custody system. Witnesses observe the full stack through glass-wall. Audit trail certified to GSE-C4 standard (same as MOD).
2

Is erasure court-admissible in civil claims?

+
Fully. Our NIST certificates are generated within an ISO 19011:2018-compliant audit stack. We can also provide expert witness statements on technique, chain-of-custody safeguards, and compliance with legal precedents such as Lloyd v Google [2021] UKSC 50.
3

Do you offer serial-number forensics post-erasure?

+
Yes. Crypto-grade erasure is coupled with HMG-accredited digital forensics partners (Hydrogen Security, QCC) to verify that no readable data remanence exists. Reports typically include AFATDS stanza-by-stanza results for submission into HMG Assurance Model review.
